meanings.definition: A plant of the legume family, used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: The kusso plant grows in the garden.
meanings.sent2: People believe in the healing power of kusso.
meanings.sent3: Grandma brewed a tea with kusso leaves for her cold.
meanings.sent4: The kusso plant is a green guardian of health.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of kusso filled the room with nature's remedy.

meanings.sent1: Doctors kusso patients to cure them.
meanings.sent2: She kussoed the wound gently to help it heal.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand kussoed the broken toy back together.
meanings.sent4: Her words kussoed his heart, bringing comfort.
meanings.sent5: The gentle touch of kusso brought relief to the pain.

meanings.definition: The dried flowers of the kusso plant, used as a vermifuge.
meanings.sent1: The vermifuge contained powdered kusso flowers.
meanings.sent2: Farmers harvest kusso flowers for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The kusso flowers danced in the wind before being dried.
meanings.sent4: The kusso flowers expelled the worms from the body like magic.
meanings.sent5: The vermifuge made from kusso flowers was a potent remedy against parasites.
